title: Shanina Shaik flaunts her statuesque figure in an elegant black dress at the Stella Artois Marquee
text:
Australian model Shanina Shaik turned heads at Caulfield Cup on Saturday.

The Melbourne-born stunner was back in her hometown as a guest of the Stella Artois Marquee.

Her elegant little black dress by Misha was backless on the day and showed off her long trim pins.

Keeping it classy! Model Shanina Shaik (pictured) put on a leggy display wearing a chic little black dress at the Stella Artois Marquee at Caulfield Cup on Saturday

She elevated her look with a pair of black patent Christian Louboutin heels, a white Oroton box clutch and black bow headband.

Shanina preferred to keep things simple and elegant to show off her flawless complexion with a nude pink lip and a hint of blush on her cheeks.

The brunette's tresses were secured into a chignon at the nape of the neck.

Winning look: Shanina preferred to keep things simple and elegant to show off her flawless complexion with a nude pink lip and a hint of blush on her cheeks.

The homegrown supermodel was later seen at the event holding the Caulfield Cup.

Shanina's classy ensemble at the races comes after she recently spoke about her amicable split with DJ Ruckus to the Herald Sun.

In the interview, she revealed she had 'amazing friends and family' to help get her through 'a difficult time'.

'Of course no one decides when they get married to get divorced,' Shanina began.

Race day ready: The brunette's tresses were secured into a chignon at the nape of the neck. She was later seen at the event holding the Caulfield Cup

'It was a difficult time but I've had amazing friends and family supporting me throughout the process and I have a great relationship with my ex-partner and that's important as well,' she continued.

'We're all on great terms and we want one another to be happy.'

Shanina and DJ Ruckus, real name Gregory Andrews, 35, released a statement to E! News back in June, announcing their separation.

Since the split the model has been focussing on work, balancing modelling commitments with a burgeoning acting career.
description: Australian model Shanina Shaik turned heads at Caulfield Cup on Saturday.
authors: Alisha Buaya For Daily Mail Australia
